name: Professor Unchained
description:
This game is part of the Game Jam for the "Play Festival". The topic was "Monsters".

This is a local multiplayer game for 3 people.

Made by: Carla Rother, Matthias Voigt, Frederic Wendt, Nicolas Vogelbusch and Benjamin Rose

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Sebastian Stamm
